meanings.definition: To exert (oneself) too much or too forcefully.
meanings.sent1: She overexerts herself by trying to lift heavy weights at the gym.
meanings.sent2: He often overexerts during his workouts, leading to muscle soreness.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel overexerts to gather all the nuts in one go, looking quite determined.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to the project sometimes leads him to overexert, like a marathon runner pushing through the last mile.
meanings.sent5: The engine overexerts, emitting smoke as it struggles to climb the steep hill.

meanings.definition: To strain or push beyond the normal limits.
meanings.sent1: The hiker overexerts himself by attempting to climb the mountain in one day.
meanings.sent2: It's important not to overexert when lifting heavy objects to avoid injury.
meanings.sent3: The cat overexerts to catch the laser pointer dot, amusing everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The tree's branches overexerted under the weight of the heavy snow, bending dangerously.
meanings.sent5: The athlete overexerts during the race, pushing past the pain to reach the finish line.
